coreAttributes.name: demonstone axe
coreAttributes.description: A common type of demonstone has been cut and enchanted into an ethereal axehead to create a weapon that causes elemental damage. Or the wielder can channel some of their aura into it and cast a spell.
coreAttributes.attackTooltipDescription: Swing at [npc.name] in melee, causing elemental damage!
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] hold of [npc.her] axe, and [npc.verb(prepare)] to use it to fight [npc.herself] in combat.

hitDescriptions.hitText: Swinging with [npc.her] Crystal Axe, [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to hit [npc2.name] in the chest, the demonstone axehead passing through [npc2.her] torso to drain [npc2.her] energy!
Hacking at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] Crystal Axe, [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to slash through [npc2.her] [npc2.arm] with the demonstone axehead and drain [npc2.her] energy!

With a quick step forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(lunge)] out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] Crystal Axe, sinking the demonstone edge into [npc2.her] shoulder and causing [npc2.herHim] to lose some energy!
hitDescriptions.criticalHitText: Expertly sidestepping around [npc2.namePos] attempt to block [npc.her] attack, [npc.name] [npc.verb(deal)] a devastating strike with [npc.her] Crystal Axe!

missDescriptions.missText: Swinging with [npc.her] Crystal Axe, [npc.name] [npc.verb(attempt)] to hit [npc2.name] in the chest, but [npc.verb(end)] up missing [npc2.herHim]!
Swinging at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] Crystal Axe, [npc.name] [npc.verb(let)] out a frustrated cry as [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
With a quick step forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(lunge)] out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] Crystal Axe, but [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
